channel.title: Vulkan on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Vulkan on Arrans github.io

item.title: flightlessmango/MangoHud
item.description: A Vulkan and OpenGL overlay for monitoring FPS, temperatures, CPU/GPU load and more. Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/Gj5YmBb

item.title: Rust-GPU/rust-gpu
item.description: 🐉 Making Rust a first-class language and ecosystem for GPU shaders 🚧

item.title: lettier/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners
item.description: 🎮 A step-by-step guide to implementing SSAO, depth of field, lighting, normal mapping, and more for your 3D game.

item.title: dotnet/Silk.NET
item.description: The high-speed OpenGL, OpenCL, OpenAL, OpenXR, GLFW, SDL, Vulkan, Assimp, WebGPU, and DirectX bindings library your mother warned you about.

item.title: cocos/cocos-engine
item.description: Cocos simplifies game creation and distribution with Cocos Creator, a free, open-source, cross-platform game engine. Empowering millions of developers to create high-performance, engaging 2D/3D games and instant web entertainment.
